resources.string:
We are Melbourne based boutique Real Estate Agency and we are currently seeking for a client service manager to join our team.

As part of a fast growing pace the successful candidate must have a can-do attitude supporting our dynamic team.

Key Attributes to the Successful Candidate
 - Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite
 - Strong customer service skills
 - Hands-on experience with office equipment
 - Professional attitude and appearance
 - Solid written and communication skills
 - Ability to be resourceful and proactive when issues arise
 - Multitasking and time-management skills

About You
You will be a reliable, bubbly, enthusiastic and mature individual with a passion for real estate. You are energetic and self-motivated, always looking to work efficiently and effectively. You enjoy working in a team and leading by example, working together to ensure that everyone is succeeding in their roles.

 Benefits
 - Professional development
 - Work from home
